text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ تِسۡعَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمۡ فَقَالَ لَهُۥ فِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي لَأَظُنُّكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ مَسۡحُورٗا

translation.en: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic
translation.id: (Dan sungguh, Kami telah memberikan kepada Musa sembilan mukjizat yang nyata483) maka tanyakanlah kepada Bani Israil, ketika Musa datang kepada mereka lalu Fir'aun berkata kepadanya, "Wahai Musa! Sesungguhnya aku benar-benar menduga engkau terkena sihir
